import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ProfileService } from '../profile.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit-profile', templateUrl: './edit-profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-profile.component.scss'] }) export class EditProfileComponent { profileForm = new FormGroup({ profile_img: new FormControl(""), username: new FormControl(""), firstname: new FormControl(""), lastname: new FormControl(""), email: new FormControl(""), mobile: new FormControl(""), email: new FormControl(""), email: new FormControl(""), }) user:any constructor(private profileservice:ProfileService, private router:Router){ console.log(this.router.getCurrentNavigation()?.extras); this.user = this.router.getCurrentNavigation()?.extras } createProfile(data:any){ this.profileservice.createProfile(data).subscribe((res:any)=>{ }, (err:any)=>{ }) } }
